nodes.text: Nicole Dubuc (born November 6, 1978) was the writer of "Hera's Heroes" and "Through Imperial Eyes." Dubuc also wrote a number of installments of the micro-series Star Wars: Forces of Destiny.

Outside of Star Wars, Dubuc has written for numerous animated series since the early 2000s. She wrote a number of installments of the popular series My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic, as well as for programs such as My Friends Tigger & Pooh, Dragon Tales and multiple installments of the Transformers franchise. She has also worked as a voice actress for several series and appeared in person as a young actress in at least three series in the 1980s to early 1990s.
